title: "AI-Based Generative Writing Models Frequently ‘Copy and Paste’ Source Data"
excerpt: "American playwright and entrepreneur Wilson Mizner is often famously quoted as saying ‘When you steal from one author, it’s plagiarism; if you steal from many, it’s research’. Similarly, the assumption around the new generation of AI-based creative writing systems is that the vast amounts of data fed to them at the training stage have resulted"
